name: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by company size, for R&D performing companies with 1–9 employees in selected industries: 2021
description: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by company size, for R&D performing companies with 1–9 employees in selected industries: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_r_d_performing_companies_number_
variableMeasured.description: All R D Performing Companies Number

variableMeasured.name: field_new_r_d_project_were_started
variableMeasured.description: New R D Project Were Started

variableMeasured.name: field_existing_r_d_projects_were_canceled
variableMeasured.description: Existing R D Projects Were Canceled

variableMeasured.name: field_existing_r_d_projects_were_disrupted
variableMeasured.description: Existing R D Projects Were Disrupted

notes: Percentages are from a "check all that apply" question. Only companies in the following North American Industrial Classification System sectors and industries are included in this table: 31–33, 42, 51, 5413, 5415, and 5417. Industry classification is based on dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2022 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2021.
